segments.text: Daylight filters through the squared window panes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is focused on her dish towel work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down, pooling at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Slippery floor could cause a slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, the boy's on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl stands ready to catch a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their mischief is endearing yet risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets getting soaked, what a shame.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Garden view contrasts the indoor havoc.
segments.speaker: PAR
